results.title: Just a short story
results.creator_credit: Bevon Peddell, Keith Salvat and SBS Independent
results.brief_description: This is a true story based on the Australia’s Stolen Generation. It is an animated account of the disintegration of an Aboriginal family on Menindee Mission in 1947. The story is told and narrated by Aunty Beryl Carmichael.

results.title: My financial career
results.creator_credit: Gerald Potterton, Colin Low, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An animated cartoon film from Stephen Leacock’s witty account of a young man’s first brush with banking. When he goes to make his deposit he is so overawed by the institution that nothing he intends to say comes out right. (Awards: Oscar nomination, Hollywood; San Francisco; New York)

results.title: My Favourite wife
results.creator_credit: Garson Kanin, Leo McCarey and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: Eight years after his wife’s disappearance in a shipwreck, Nick Arden remarries. However Ellen is not dead and reappears in time to join Nick and his new wife Bianca on their honeymoon. Nick lacks the courage to tell Bianca the truth and the situation becomes more complicated when he discovers that Ellen was not alone on her “desert island.” Starring Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Randolph Scott and Gail Patrick. This comedy will delight lovers of the suave Cary Grant.

results.title: No fear, no die = Sen fout la mort [NTSC] (D)
results.creator_credit: Claire Denis, Philippe Carcassonne, Francis Boespflug, La Sept, NEF Filmproduktion, Camera One, Les Films de Mindif, Pyramid Films and Cinea
results.brief_description: This unsettling and at times disturbing film deals with the unpalatable and violent practice of illegal cockfighting in France. But director Claire Denis (Chocolat, Good work, Nenette and Boni) looks further into the motives and reasons behind those who indulge in this rather nasty past-time and in doing so has produced a film with soul and depth, exploring the complexities of human nature. The story revolves around the two main characters of Dah (Isaach de Bankole), an African immigrant and Jocelyn (Alex Descas), a West Indian, who team up in a partnership to train and supply fighting cocks for the rather unsavoury bar-owner Pierre Ardennes (Jean-Claude Brialy) whose soul aim is to make big money through holding cockfights in the basement of his saloon. Add to this fray, Toni (Solveig Dommartin), Ardennes’ mistress who becomes involved with Dah, Jocelyn’s obsession with the cocks, and money - everyone wanting more of it - and things begin to escalate. Harsh, bleak and realistic portrayal by an exceptional cast, with excellent directing by Denis, and confronting and extraordinary visuals by cinematographer Pascal Marti. NB: WARNING - Includes several graphic scenes of cockfighting and handling. In French with English subtitles.
results.title_for_label: No fear, no die = Sen fout la mort [NTSC] (D)

results.title: No bugles, no drums
results.creator_credit: John Burnett, Debra Beattie-Burnett, Australian Film Commission and Seven Emus Productions
results.brief_description: The untold story of Aboriginal involvement in World War II. This program promises to be a striking reminder of the contribution made by the Aboriginal people during Australia’s darkest hours.

results.title: No big money
results.creator_credit: Doug White, John Taylor and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The Hudon family left the city to become modern pioneers on their ranch in the Cariboo country of British Columbia The winters are harsh, the work load is heavy, money is scarce, but they live on their own land. The film presents an unvarnished look at the problems and joys they experience as a family.

results.title: No apple for Johnny
results.creator_credit: John Weldon, Robert Verrall, Dorothy Courtois, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: This documentary cartoon is the visual enactment of the year-long obstacle course run by a teacher trainee. Rich in humour and anecdote, it is a comedy of educational manners seen through the autobiographical eye of a trainee-turned-filmmaker.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Weldon, Robert Verrall, Dorothy Courtois, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: No alternative
results.creator_credit: Tara Fitzpatrick, MTV and Red Hot Organisation
results.brief_description: No Alternative is a collaboration between independent filmmakers and musicians dedicated to raising awareness of issues affecting people living with HIV and AIDS. The video combines live performances, poetry readings and experimental short films. Some highlights include Hal Hartley’s evocative video for The Breeder’s song “Iris”; Tamara Davis’ documentary on the Riot Girls music scene (featuring Courtney Love, Kim Gordon and Huggy Bear); Lou Reed reading his poem “Busload of Faith”; Jennie Livingston’s tribute to lesbian comedy (with music by the Smashing Pumpkins); and Derek Jarman’s poetic super-8 short film based on Patti Smith’s memorial to Robert Mapplethorpe. Music is provided by The Breeders, Smashing Pumpkins, Neneh Cherry, Urge Overkill, Suede, Buffalo Tom and an uncredited Nirvana. This exceptional video manages to be challenging, musically innovative, and informative.

results.title: Nirvana Street murder
results.creator_credit: Aleksi Vellis, Fiona Cochrane, Cochrane Productions and Vellis
results.brief_description: This film tells the story of two brothers. One brother is a law abiding citizen who looks after a wealthy bedridden old lady in his spare time and tries desperately to win over the Greek immigrant parents of his girlfriend. The other is a likeable but dangerously off-the-wall criminal type who is sheltered by his ditzy pregnant girlfriend. A confrontation with the police and their Greek counterparts tears everything apart. The clash of cultures and turfs is a strong element in the story, which generally roars along with a mixture of comedy, violence and drama. Stars Ben Mendelsohn, Mark Little, Mary Coustas and the late Sheila Florance.
